data.title: Warner Music
data.meta_description: Collaborate with Warner Music via AvenueAR. Elevate your musical journey by connecting with industry giants. Submit your music!
data.text:
Demo song submission to Warner Music

How to submit a demo song to Warner Music?

Demos should only be submitted to our record labels (e.g., Atlantic, Elektra, Warner Records, Parlophone) for consideration, not directly to Warner Music Group. However, please note that our record labels do not accept unsolicited materials. Join Today!

Create a free account

No Credit Card

Warner Music does not accept unsolicited material

Warner Music explicitly states that they do not accept song demo submissions.

Please read the disclaimer below to better understand their policies.

Demos should only be submitted to Warner Music Group’s record labels (e.g., Atlantic, Elektra, Warner Records, Parlophone) for consideration, not directly to Warner Music Group. However, please note that Warner Music Group’s record labels do not accept unsolicited materials. This means that your demo must be recommended to our labels by an established industry professional (manager, agent, lawyer, journalists, one of our artists, etc.). Industry professionals that understand the creative goals of our record labels are best suited to make these recommendations.

We strongly suggest you seek out the assistance of one of these individuals.

The best way to submit music to Warner Music

Remember that music submission processes can vary, and it’s essential to stay updated with any changes or new features offered by AvenueAR. Always ensure that your music is professionally produced and ready for consideration by major labels like Warner Music.

Steps to submitting to Warner Music

Submitting your music to Warner Music, one of the major record labels, typically involves following industry-standard practices. Here’s a general guide on how to submit your music to Warner Music:

Create an AvenueAR Account:

Sign up for an AvenueAR account if you haven’t already. Ensure that your profile is complete with accurate information about yourself and your music.

Navigate to the Submission Section:

Log in to your AvenueAR account and look for a section or feature related to music submissions. This section may be labeled as “Submit Music” or something similar.

Choose Warner Music or A&R Executive:

Within the submission section, you may have the option to choose Warner Music as your desired destination or select a specific A&R executive affiliated with Warner Music.

Follow Submission Guidelines:

AvenueAR may provide specific guidelines for music submissions. Follow these guidelines carefully, which may include details on file format, song selection, and a brief introduction.

Upload Your Music:

Prepare your music files and upload them to AvenueAR as per their instructions. Ensure that your music is of high quality and represents your best work.

Submit Your Music:

Submit your music through AvenueAR’s platform. Make sure to double-check that all required information and files are included before finalizing your submission.

Wait for Response:

After submitting your music, be patient and wait for a response. It may take some time for Warner Music or the affiliated A&R executive to review your submission.

Follow Up:

If you receive a positive response, follow any instructions provided for further communication or potential collaboration. If you receive a rejection or no response, continue to work on your music career independently and consider submitting to other opportunities.
